TEXT.Italian: L'unità %[s2_UnitName] dell'%[s1_CivName] ha sconfitto l'unità %[s4_UnitName] dell'%[s3_CivName]!
L'unità %[s2_UnitName] dell'%[s1_CivName] viene colpita subendo %[d3] punti di danno (%[d4]/%[d5]PV)
TEXT.Spanish: [NUM2:Un:Una:Unos:Unas] %[s2_UnitName] del %[s1_CivName] (con %[d3]/%[d4] PG) [NUM2:ha alcanzado:ha alcanzado:han alcanzado:han alcanzado] a [NUM6:un:una:unos:unas] %[s6_UnitName] del %[s5_CivName] (con %[d7]/%[d8] PG) y [NUM6:le han infligido:le han infligido:les han infligido:les han infligido] %[d9] de daño.
Transfiriendo datos de la partida a

Spanish.Text: Unidad con armas de proyectil:Unidades con armas de proyectil

TEXT.English: To win a Gone to Hell victory, the whole of Erebus must be covered by Hell Terrain and you must be responsible for more of the AC total than any other player, or Agares himself.
TEXT.French: To win a Gone to Hell victory, the whole of Erebus must be covered by Hell Terrain and you must be responsible for more of the AC total than any other player, or Agares himself.
TEXT.German: Um einen Sieg durch "Zur Hölle!" zu erringen, muß ganz Erebus von Höllenterrain überzogen sein, und du mußt mehr Anteil als alle anderen Spieler und selbst Agares an dem Armageddonzählerstand aufweisen können.
TEXT.Italian: To win a Gone to Hell victory, the whole of Erebus must be covered by Hell Terrain and you must be responsible for more of the AC total than any other player, or Agares himself.
TEXT.Spanish: To win a Gone to Hell victory, the whole of Erebus must be covered by Hell Terrain and you must be responsible for more of the AC total than any other player, or Agares himself.

TEXT.English: %d1%% of Erebus is covered by hell terrain (need %d2%%)
TEXT.French: %d1%% d'Erebus sont envahis par les Enfers (%d2%% requis)
TEXT.German: %d1%% von Erebus ist mit Höllenterrain bedeckt (benötigt %d2%%)
TEXT.Italian: %d1%% of Erebus is covered by hell terrain (need %d2%%)
TEXT.Spanish: %d1%% of Erebus is covered by hell terrain (need %d2%%)

TEXT.French: Contributions individuelles au compteur Armageddon (le plus élevé gagne)

TEXT.English: If a Great Prophet is sacrificed the Altar of the Luonnotar can be built. Each further Great Prophet sacrificed improves the Altar and if the altar is improved to its final form (requiring 6 Great Prophets) the player wins the game.
TEXT.French: Si un Prophète Illustre est sacrifié, l'Autel des Luonnotar peut être construit. Chaque Prophète Illustre sacrifié ensuite améliore l'Autel et si l'autel est amélioré dans sa forme finale (requerrant 7 Prophètes Illustres), le joueur gagne la partie.
TEXT.German: Wenn ein großer Prophet geopfert wird kann er den Altar des Luonnotar errichten. Jeder weitere große Prophet welcher geopfert wird erweitert den Altar um eine Stufe und wenn der Altar vollendet ist (dies benötigt 7 große Propheten) gewinnt der Spieler die Partie
TEXT.Italian: If a Great Prophet is sacrificed the Altar of the Luonnotar can be built. Each further Great Prophet sacrificed improves the Altar and if the altar is improved to its final form (requiring 6 Great Prophets) the player wins the game.
TEXT.Spanish: If a Great Prophet is sacrificed the Altar of the Luonnotar can be built. Each further Great Prophet sacrificed improves the Altar and if the altar is improved to its final form (requiring 6 Great Prophets) the player wins the game.

TEXT.English: If a player is able to build all four of the lesser towers, the Tower of Alteration, Tower of Divination, Tower of Elementalism and Tower of Necromancy and has access to all 15 mana types they will be able to construct the Tower of Mastery. If it is completed that player will win the game.
TEXT.French: Si un joueur est capable de construire les quatre tours mineurs, la Tour d'Altération, la Tour de Divination, la Tour d'Elémentalisme et la Tour de Nécromancie, et si il a accès aux 14 types de manas, il sera alors capable de construire la Tour de Maîtrise. S'il la termine, le joueur remporte la partie.
TEXT.German: Ist ein Spieler in der Lage, jeden der 4 niederen Türme zu erbauen, den Turm der Alteration, den Turm der Weissagung, den Turm der Elemente sowie den Turm der Nekromantie und besitzt Zugang zu allen 14 Manatypen, steht es ihm frei, auch den Turm der Macht zu errichten. Bei seiner Vollendung, gewinnt der Erbauer das Spiel.
TEXT.Italian: If a player is able to build all four of the lesser towers, the Tower of Alteration, Tower of Divination, Tower of Elementalism and Tower of Necromancy and has access to all 15 mana types they will be able to construct the Tower of Mastery. If it is completed that player will win the game.
TEXT.Spanish: If a player is able to build all four of the lesser towers, the Tower of Alteration, Tower of Divination, Tower of Elementalism and Tower of Necromancy and has access to all 15 mana types they will be able to construct the Tower of Mastery. If it is completed that player will win the game.

TEXT.French: Appuyez sur <ENTRÉE> pour finir votre tour...
